name: Auto Filter Bot
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesn't Need Manuall Filter Adding

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID From my.telegram.org or @UseTGzkBot

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash From my.telegram.org or @UseTGzkBot

DB_URI.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

USER_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram User Session String. Get from https://replit.com/@ZauteKm/GenerateStringSession
